entry.def: If there is an imbalance in a situation, the things involved are not the same size, or are not the right size in proportion to each other.

example.ex: ...the imbalance between the two sides in this war.
example.tran: 这场战争中双方力量的悬殊

example.ex: ...an international strategy to reduce trade imbalances.
example.tran: 降低贸易逆差的国际战略
